div.h1: Looking Out for Your Mental Health during the Covid-19 Pandemic

div.p: In addition to guiding remote learning during the school closure, APS also is mindful of the mental health and well-being of all our students and their families.
We have just posted a list of Covid-19 resources for families, along with the first in a series of videos on topic of coping in times of crisis.

p.img: Watch: "Stuck in the House with Kids? Avoiding Common Parent Traps," a video from APS Behavior Coach Andrew Jakobcic

div.p: Please check the Covid-19 Information Center for ongoing updates as we weather these times together.

div.a: Board of Education Meeting Via Zoom

div.p: Due to Covid-19 Executive Orders, our regular meeting of the Allendale Board of Education will be conducted via Zoom. Information to join the meeting is below.

Topic: APS Board of Education 4/20/20
Time: Apr 20, 2020 06:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada)
Join Zoom Meeting
https://zoom.us/j/94392193338?pwd=dFAvWXhuclJtN2FQV2hlYUYzNDQydz09
Meeting ID: 943 9219 3338
Password: 6m3Fxm

div.a: Oakwood Remote Learning Packets Now Available Online

div.p: New Remote Learning Packets are available. The assignments included are spread across the two weeks between April 20 and May 1.

We have prepared hard-copy packets for families without internet access, or who’ve made a special request for a hard copy. These packets will be mailed directly to home addresses and should arrive in the next couple of days.
You can also download all of the 4th and 5th packets from this website.
